title: How to study philosophy academically after an undergraduate degree in engineering - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A. you need to reach out to your desired school and department first. They will tell you what courses you need to do as prerequisite for a economics graduate degree. Once you do the courses, you can ten be admitted for a graduate degree. They can also admit you conditionally. You can also go for a bachelors in economics. There are many people with engineering background later got masters or PhD in economics.
